PartyProfile.name: PartyProfile
PartyProfile.description: Represents information about the profile of a party, such as a contact, account, or lead.

AccountId.description: The account that's associated with the party profile.

BusLicIssAuthorityName.description: The name of the business license issuing authority.

BusinessEntityCtryofInc.description: Specifies the country where the business entity was formed.

BusinessEntityCtryofRgstr.description: Specifies the country where the business entity is registered.

BusinessEntityIncDate.description: The incorporation date of the business entity associated with the party profile.

BusinessEntityIncNumber.description: The incorporation number of the business entity associated with the party profile.

BusinessEntityName.description: The registered name of the business entity associated with the party profile.

BusinessEntityPreviousNames.description: Any previous names of the business entity associated with the party profile.

BusinessEntityRgstrDate.description: The registration date of the business entity associated with the party profile.

BusinessEntityRgstrNumber.description: The registration number of the business entity associated with the party profile.

BusinessEntityTradeName.description: The trading name of the business entity associated with the party profile.

BusinessEntityType.description: Specifies the type of the business entity associated with the party profile.

ContactId.description: The contact that's associated with the party profile.

CountryOfDomicile.description: Specifies the country of domicile in the party profile.

CountryofBirth.description: Specifies the country of birth in the party profile.

CreditScore.description: The credit score of the party.

CreditScoreProvider.description: Specifies the name of the agency that provides the credit score of the party.

CustomerReferenceNumber.description: The unique identifier that the bank assigns to the customer associated with the party profile record.

DateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of the party.

EmploymentIndustry.description: Specifies the employment industry of the party specified in the profile.

EmploymentType.description: Specifies the type of employment held by the party.

FirstName.description: The first name of the party in the profile.

FullName.description: The full name of the party profile.

FundSource.description: Specifies the source of funds for a party in the profile.

Gender.description: Specifies the gender of the party in the profile.

HouseholdAccountId.description: The household account that's associated with the party profile.

Industry.description: Represents the industry in which a business entity operates.

IndustryClassificationCode.description: The unique code associated with the industry in which a business entity operates.

IsBusEntyListonStockExch.description: Specifies whether the business entity is listed on a stock exchange (true) or not (false).

IsNetWorthHigh.description: Indicates whether the customer has a high net worth (true) or not (false).

IsOffBoarded.description: Indicates whether the party profile was off-boarded (true) or not (false).

IsVerified.description: Indicates whether the party profile is verified (true) or not (false).

LastName.description: The last name of the party in the profile.

LastProfileReviewDate.description: The date when the party profile was last reviewed.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LeadId.description: The lead that's associated with the party profile.

LegalEntityIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of the business entity used in all financial transactions.

MiddleName.description: The middle name of the party in the profile.

Name.description: The name of the party profile record.

Nationality.description: The nationalities held by the party profile.

NextProfileReviewDate.description: The date of the next party profile review.

OffBoardingComments.description: The date of the next party profile review.

OffBoardingReason.description: The reason the party profile was off-boarded.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the record owner.

Prefix.description: The prefix used by the party.

PrimaryEmail.description: The primary email address of the party that's specified in the profile.

PrimaryIdentificationName.description: The name of the primary identification document specified in the profile.

PrimaryIdentifier.description: The unique identifier for the party.

PrimaryIdentifierType.description: Specifies the type of primary identification document defined in the profile.

PrimaryPhone.description: The primary phone number of the party that's specified in the profile.

RelatedPartyProfileId.description: The party profile record associated with this record.

ResidentType.description: Specifies the type of party residency in the profile.

ReviewDecision.description: Specifies the decision taken after the party profile review is complete.

Stage.description: The current stage of the party profile.

StockExchangeName.description: Specifies the name of the stock exchange where the business entity is listed.

Suffix.description: The suffix used by the party.

SurnameAtBirth.description: The party surname at birth specified in the profile.

TaxpayerIdentificationNumber.description: The taxpayer identifier that's used for tax purposes.

TaxpayerIdentificationType.description: The type of taxpayer identification used for tax purposes.

Type.description: Specifies the type of the party profile associated with the applicant.

RetirementFundAccountNumber.description: The retirement fund account number of the party profile
